item.title: What is an Eco city?
item.description: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7ygw2L-Qi0c What is an eco city? What will tomorrow’s green city look like? How do you build cities that do more with less to provide for ever-growing populations? Sustainable housing, energy efficiency, internmodal passenger transport, and smart grids for electrical distribution will all play a role in shaping the future of urban planning. This animated short film gets to the heart of the challenges we face in making sustainable cities a reality.
